description: HDOS is leagues above runelite in terms of performance, especially in areas where your frames would drop (priffdinas, fossil island). It has *most* plugins pre-installed with the client that come with runelite such as menu entry swapper, ground markers, hiscores lookup, loot tracker. Give it a try, I was pleasantly surprised after brushing it off so long.
Perfect for the steam deck, I can max out graphical settings anf maintain a stable 60 fps!
Works well, glad to have this launcher on Linux
